metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25737 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes where a user may be able toredirect pod traffic to private networks on a Node. Kubernetes alreadyprevents creation of Endpoint IPs in the localhost or link-local range, butthe same validation was not performed on EndpointSlice IPs.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
